ygData.subject: Subscription Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Sheesh this is a quiet place considering the game is down. Look, I need a little reassuance and help. I remember being out of town the first time the chance to
ygData.messageBody:
Sheesh this is a quiet place considering the game is down.
Look, I need a little reassuance and help. I remember being out of
town the first time the chance to order Kunark came up. I ordered
that
monday online but never recieved E-mail confirming. Now I read on
EQCasters (nice site) of folks calling with the same issue and being
told they "can't find the order in Verant's data base, but not to
worry, you will get it".
Gimme a hand, I am girdding for war. Wasn't the Monday after it came
out April 10th ? Or the third ? AND any of you in the same boat ?

...crimenie, a large envelope came in the mail and I grinned ear to
ear until I opened it in the kitchen and found my wifes prescription
pills. I almost took them all in a despairing protest :)

Thanks
Moonflower Bllue
Bard of the 41st Catana, Cazic-Thule
